languages.text: "Понимаю, Ваша Светлость". {n}Мужчина не делает попыток защититься. Он принимает смерть словно неприятную, но необходимую медицинскую процедуру.{/n}
"I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Понимаю, Ваша Светлость". {n}Мужчина не делает попыток защититься. Он принимает смерть словно неприятную, но необходимую медицинскую процедуру.{/n}

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: “我能理解，大人。”{n}这个人完全没有自卫的打算。他接受了死亡，就像接受不愉快但必不可少的医疗操作一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我能理解，大人。”{n}这个人完全没有自卫的打算。他接受了死亡，就像接受不愉快但必不可少的医疗操作一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「分かりました、陛下」{n}男は防御をしようともせず、死を受け入れた。さながら不愉快な治療を受け入れる患者のように。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「分かりました、陛下」{n}男は防御をしようともせず、死を受け入れた。さながら不愉快な治療を受け入れる患者のように。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «Entiendo, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}El hombre no intenta defenderse. Acepta la muerte como el que acepta una intervención médica desagradable pero necesaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}El hombre no intenta defenderse. Acepta la muerte como el que acepta una intervención médica desagradable pero necesaria.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Der Mann macht keinerlei Anstalten, sich zu verteidigen. Er akzeptiert den Tod, wie man eine unangenehme, aber notwendige medizinische Behandlung akzeptieren würde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Der Mann macht keinerlei Anstalten, sich zu verteidigen. Er akzeptiert den Tod, wie man eine unangenehme, aber notwendige medizinische Behandlung akzeptieren würde.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « Je comprends, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}L'homme ne cherche même pas à se défendre. Il accepte la mort comme on accepterait une intervention médicale déplaisante, mais nécessaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, Votre Seigneurie. »{n}L'homme ne cherche même pas à se défendre. Il accepte la mort comme on accepterait une intervention médicale déplaisante, mais nécessaire.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Anlıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Adam, kendini savunmaya teşebbüs etmiyor bile. Kişinin hoş olmayan fakat gerekli bir tıbbi işlemi kabullenmesi gibi ölümü kabulleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship." {n}The man makes no attempt to defend himself. He accepts death as one would accept an unpleasant but necessary medical procedure.{/n}
